content.rendered:
Appointment Scheduler | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-time, Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
  • 1+ Year medical appointment scheduling experience
  • Preference given to those with specialty scheduling experience
  • Will schedule for multiple physicians
  • Must be able to multi-task, work well independently or as part of team
  • Must be able to communicate effectively with patients, and physicians and their office staff
  • $12-$13/hour
